metadata.title: Yen Wee Lim - Lead AI Solutions | Full-Stack Product Builder
metadata.description: I build software that ships -- agentic AI platforms, APIs, dashboards, and data pipelines. From idea to production. Based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
metadata.author: Yen Wee Lim
metadata.ogTitle: Yen Wee Lim - Lead AI Solutions | Full-Stack Product Builder
metadata.ogDescription: Full-stack product builder specializing in agentic AI platforms, APIs, dashboards, and data pipelines in Malaysia.

intro.description: Always interested in new opportunities, collaborations, and conversations about AI, data science, and machine learning.

services.title: Agentic AI & LLM Products
services.description: End-to-end AI agent development using LangGraph and modern LLM frameworks. From autonomous data-mining workflows to RAG-powered report generation and industry-specific AI agents.

services.title: Software & API Development
services.description: Production-grade web applications, REST APIs, and backend services built with FastAPI, Next.js, and modern cloud-native architectures.

services.title: Data Platforms & Pipelines
services.description: Scalable data warehouses, ETL pipelines, and MLOps platforms using Docker, Airflow, Kubernetes, and cloud infrastructure on AWS.

services.title: Dashboards & Business Intelligence
services.description: Interactive dashboards and analytics platforms that turn complex datasets into actionable insights for stakeholders across finance, e-commerce, and enterprise.

workExperience.description: Led the product vision and development of AiMod — Malaysia's first homegrown agentic AI DataOps & MLOps platform, from concept to production, improving MLOps efficiency by up to 80%. Built LLM AI Agents using LangGraph for autonomous data-mining workflows including generative BI dashboards, interactive report generation with RAG, and industry deep research agents.

Developed Income Estimation (MAPE ~25%) and Loan Screening ML models (AUC = 0.75) using XGBoost, Scikit-learn, FastAPI, and Docker. Built and maintained a 6TB data warehouse (PostgreSQL) with daily ETL replication and scraping jobs on Apache Airflow. Spearheaded an internal MLOps platform for on-demand model retraining utilizing automated feature selection from Feast.

Developed web dashboards for 300+ stakeholders for profitability monitoring and key account management. Automated competitor pricing analysis of 600K daily records via a Price Check taskforce. Modeled an Item Recommendation Engine that eliminated 100+ hours of weekly manual curation and doubled average sales uplifts for key accounts.

education.achievements: President's List — 2 Semesters, Dean's List — 4 Semesters
